REQ-RSCH-001.title: Three-Tier Research Structure
REQ-RSCH-001.notes: Foundational spec - defines 3-tier draft system (Doctrine, Specialization, Capstone) with RP thresholds. No dependencies on other systems.

REQ-RSCH-002.title: Doctrine System (Tier 1)

blockers.reason: Requires tier system framework; can implement doctrines independently with hardcoded thresholds

REQ-RSCH-002.notes: Defines 3 doctrines: War Machine (+2 STR, -10% income), Fortress (+4 AC, -5% attack), Commerce (+2 CHA, +20% sell). All are independent mechanics.

REQ-RSCH-003.title: Specialization System Overview

blockers.reason: Requires tier system and RP thresholds
Specializations unlock based on doctrine choice; can implement independently

REQ-RSCH-003.notes: Parent spec for REQ-RSCH-003-A through REQ-RSCH-003-F. Defines Tier 2 mechanics: hidden specializations, reveal conditions (combat, espionage, alliance).

REQ-RSCH-003-A.title: Shock Troops Specialization

blockers.reason: Unlocked by War Machine doctrine; can implement combat mechanic independently

REQ-RSCH-003-A.notes: War Machine specialization: surprise round (attack before initiative). Countered by Shield Arrays (REQ-RSCH-003-C).

REQ-RSCH-003-B.title: Siege Engines Specialization

blockers.reason: Unlocked by War Machine doctrine; can implement combat mechanic independently

REQ-RSCH-003-B.notes: War Machine specialization: +50% damage vs stationary targets, treat AC as 10. Countered by Minefield Networks (REQ-RSCH-003-D).

REQ-RSCH-003-C.title: Shield Arrays Specialization

blockers.reason: Unlocked by Fortress doctrine; can implement independently
Counters Shock Troops; requires Shock Troops implemented to verify counter works

REQ-RSCH-003-C.notes: Fortress specialization: immunity to surprise rounds (negates Shock Troops). Countered by Siege Engines (REQ-RSCH-003-B).

REQ-RSCH-003-D.title: Minefield Networks Specialization

blockers.reason: Unlocked by Fortress doctrine; can implement independently

REQ-RSCH-003-D.notes: Fortress specialization: pre-combat CON save DC 15 or lose 10% HP. Countered by Shock Troops (REQ-RSCH-003-A) which clears mines in surprise round.

REQ-RSCH-003-E.title: Trade Monopoly Specialization

blockers.reason: Unlocked by Commerce doctrine; can implement economics mechanic independently

REQ-RSCH-003-E.notes: Commerce specialization: buy -20%, sell +30% (economic only, no combat effect). Pure economic bonus.

REQ-RSCH-003-F.title: Mercenary Contracts Specialization

blockers.reason: Unlocked by Commerce doctrine; can implement independently

REQ-RSCH-003-F.notes: Commerce specialization: pay 10,000 cr for +2 STR per battle. Converts economic resources into temporary military advantage.

REQ-RSCH-004.title: Capstone System (Tier 3)

blockers.reason: Requires tier system and RP threshold (15,000 RP); can implement capstone mechanics independently
Capstone unlocks depend on doctrine choice; can hardcode doctrines

REQ-RSCH-004.notes: Tier 3 auto-unlocks at 15,000 RP: War Machine→Dreadnought (STR 20, HP 200, 4d12+5), Fortress→Citadel World (AC 25), Commerce→Economic Hegemony (50% #2 income).

REQ-RSCH-005.title: Research Point Economy
REQ-RSCH-005.notes: Research sectors generate 100 RP/turn. RP accumulates toward thresholds (1k, 5k, 15k). Progress hidden from enemies. No cross-system dependencies.

REQ-RSCH-006.title: Research Information Visibility

blockers.reason: Doctrine choices are public; must implement doctrine system first
Specializations are hidden by default; visibility rules depend on specialization system
Capstone unlocks are public announcements; must implement capstone system

REQ-RSCH-006.notes: Asymmetric visibility: PUBLIC (doctrines, capstones, sector count), HIDDEN (RP totals, progress %, specializations). Revealed via combat, espionage, alliance, rumors.

REQ-RSCH-007.title: Research-Combat Integration

blockers.reason: Doctrine bonuses (STR/AC modifiers) must be defined; can implement combat integration without specialization
Specialization conditional effects must be defined; can defer specialization integration

REQ-RSCH-007.notes: Applies research bonuses to combat: doctrine bonuses modify unit STR/AC, specialization bonuses trigger conditional combat effects. Integrates with D20 system.

REQ-RSCH-008.title: Specialization Counter-Play

blockers.reason: Shock Troops must exist to verify counters work
Siege Engines must exist to verify counters work
Shield Arrays must exist to verify counters work
Minefield Networks must exist to verify counters work

REQ-RSCH-008.notes: Rock-paper-scissors counter relationships: Shield Arrays > Shock Troops, Siege Engines > Shield Arrays, Minefield Networks > Siege Engines, Shock Troops > Minefield Networks.

REQ-RSCH-009.title: Investigate Specialization Operation

blockers.reason: Specialization system must exist to investigate; can implement operation independently
Relies on visibility rules; can implement investigation without full visibility framework

REQ-RSCH-009.notes: Espionage operation: 5,000 cr cost, 85% success, reveals target specialization. Failure costs credits and -10 reputation. Integrated into Phase 5 Covert Operations.

REQ-RSCH-010.title: Galactic News Rumor System

blockers.reason: Rumors include doctrine info; requires doctrine system for realistic rumors
Rumors include specialization speculation; requires specialization system
Rumors include capstone progress; can generate generic rumors without capstone system

REQ-RSCH-010.notes: Every 10 turns: 5 rumors (3 true, 2 false). Triggered in turn processor (Phase timing TBD). Players cannot distinguish true from false (50% accuracy).

REQ-RSCH-011.title: Alliance Intel Sharing

blockers.reason: Specializations shared with allies; requires specialization system
Visibility rules change for coalition members; requires visibility framework

REQ-RSCH-011.notes: Coalition members auto-share research intel: your specialization revealed to allies, see allied specializations. Integrated with coalition mechanics.

REQ-RSCH-012.title: Bot Research Decision Logic

blockers.reason: Bots must choose doctrines; can implement with archetype preferences
Bots must choose specializations; requires specialization system for full implementation

REQ-RSCH-012.notes: Bot decision logic: 80% follow archetype preference, 20% counter-pick based on neighbors. Strategic bots analyze threats. Integrated with bot AI system.

wave1_tier1_mechanics: REQ-RSCH-002 (Doctrine System - War Machine, Fortress, Commerce)

keyInsights.notes: RESEARCH system is fully self-contained with no hard dependencies on other game systems. All combat integration points are marked as SOFT blockers since combat bonuses can be implemented independently. Intelligence gameplay (espionage, alliance sharing, rumors) drives strategic depth without requiring external systems.
